All Domain Name Services
In addition to Domain Registration, we offer several domain related services.
Domain Registration
Search & Register your domain name in over 1000 domain extensions
Trademark Clearinghouse
New extensions are periodically being released, register with priority in Sunrise stage.
Domain Renewals
Periodically renew the expiration date of your domain name.
Hosting Plans
We offer free and unlimited hosting plans with each domain name.
Domain Transfer
Transfer the administration of your domain to Marcaria.com
SSL Certificates
Protect the communication between your website and your clients.
